ygData.subject: Re: To Dachande
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Its alright Dachande. I kind of panicked because i didnt want Vulois to fail in my hands.  i wanted Minime to have a good legacy ... Vulois: Good.

OOC: Its alright Dachande. I kind of panicked because i didnt want Vulois to 
fail in my hands.  i wanted Minime to have a good legacy

:::Vulois/The Destrocons/Falcon/Snare:::

::Vulois smiled at their responce::
Vulois: Good. Magmatron controls you Cybershark?  No need to worry.  The 
first thing we'll do is go to the Destrons.  We'll convince them of peace and 
that you should have freedom from control of Magmatron at the same time.  Bu 
tbefore we do anything in the way of peace, we must return to my mountain 
lair.  I dont think this cave would be good for a base, not to mention that 
we are dangerously close to the Alliance.
::He walks out of the cave and takes off flying in the direction of his old 
lair, motioning them to follow him::
~~~~~
Ramjet: Well, personally, i dont know what i think.  I've been a loyal 
Destron for a long time.  Me and my team served under Magmatron, then 
Bobertron, and now you.  i cant picture myself not being a Destron.  But on 
the other hand, that Cerberus guy basically denounced the fact that we are 
Destrons.  I will only continue if Magmatron insures us that our lives are 
not in danger and that we will be considered as much Destrons as his other 
troops are.
::The others agree and wait for Shredders responce::

--part1_66.a976f6b.27761894_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
